25036.name: {RT{rri{Bp{bower {CG{crand {CC{central {*- {RT{rri{Bp{bower {RT{rower {RE{rntrance{x

description: Each flag has a name on it, they are gatable creatures in each area.
A small room, a view out the window shows a great scene of the mountains,
A neat and tidy desk sits here, and a map on the wall shows all the major
areas of the realms, little flags mark each area, with writing on each one.
25511.name: Office of Magical Transportation

description: This room has a great View of the Southern Mountains, to the East you can
see the Forest and Plains Stretch out forever ...  On the horizon you can
see the Glimmering of the Sea.  On the Wall stretches the most complete map
of the Realms you have ever seen, marked here and there are pin notes.  They
notate regions needing roadwork.  The center piece of the room looks to be
an oaktree ...  Still growing ...  Painstakingly formed into a flat top
workstation.  A limb grows behind it forming the seat.  A Mural of Sune
adorns the Wall behind his desk.
25514.name: Keldon's Private Office

description: This is the 20th Floor of the Tripower Complex Tower.  To the west
is the doors leading to the Office of Lord Bloodstoner, ruler and
president of the Tripower Empire.  A large hallway leads to the west,
passing the doors of the President's Office to the other staircase.
Large windows look out to the south over the waiting room below.
25091.name: The 20th Floor [East]

description: You walk along the {*The {yB{&ac{yk {RH{rall{Rs{* of the {YT{yo{&w{ye{Yr{x.  To the south the
hallway goes towards the {YG{yr{&a{yn{Yd {RS{rtore{x.  The hallway continues its way
to the east, leadind around the elevator and the other side of the
{YG{yr{&a{yn{Yd {RS{rtore{x.
25802.name: {*The {yB{&ac{yk {RH{rall{Rs{* of the {YT{yo{&w{ye{Yr{x

description: You stand in the National Library of the TriPower.  To either side
of you, the walls of books, and the knowledge within them, stands.  To
the north, you see the model of Torregiano, held under bright lights.
To the northeast and northwest, you see the reading tables.  And to
the far north, the door to the Cannon Area.
25203.name: The National Library <Main>

description: The tower is constructed from a dark grey marble,
carved from the lands of Deva, known for its valuable
minerals.  Each giant block was set in place with a
series of pullies and chains, lifted from the ground
below, weighing over several tons.  Cranes could now
make this job simple, but the tower was built while
the Tripower was young, along with technology.
25198.name: {GS{gouth-{GF{gace {&of the {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GT{gower{x

description: A small hallway stretches north between the Tripower Tower
Staircase and Floor 9, the Tripowerian Congressional Room.  These
stairs primarily are used as a backup in case the elevator is out of
order.
25278.name: {CH{callway to the {RT{rri{Bp{bower {CT{cower {RStairs {c[{CFloor {M09{c]{x

description: A melting pot of ideas, and procedures is constantly going on here.
Several people are trying to figure out new ways to farm and gather.
Some are drawing plans to farm machines others are trying to come up
with new types of fertilizers, and even others still or developing weed
killers.
25411.name: Experimental Farming Procedures

description: You are walking in the federal mint of the TriPower.  Large vats of gold
are poored into huge iron molds, filled with tiny idividual molds that shape
the gold into tiny gold coins.  People then collect the tiny coins after
they are cool, and put thme in large sacks, with the TriPower seal on them.
The only exit is south.
25120.name: The Printing Floors

description: You stand at the middle platform.  Before you stands the train
platform.  You see the train tracks below you, running into the
underground tunnels of the station.  The platform seems to go in
either direction.  Pillars line the platforms just east of here, and
pass the pillars is the station.
25623.name: {RT{rri{Bp{bower {CG{crand {CC{central {*- {RM{rain {RP{rlatform{x

description: A large hall stands before you.  A large picture window to the
north overlooks Torregiano and The Sea Of Istar.  In the center of the
room is a large desk, a secretary sits behind it, looking at you.
Surrounding the desk is sorted chairs and couches, for people to wait.
Along the walls you see armed men, dress in The Legion Uniform.  On
the walls you see diffrent pictures of places around Torregiano.  You
see The Makou Gas Reactors, "Stalin's Organ", and a picture of an
airship.  To the north, you see two staircases leading up, a guard
stands infront of each one, keeping an eye on you.  The room is bright
white marble, pillars line the outter walls.  A Sign Hangs on the
front of the secretary's desk.
25088.name: President Reception Room

description: You are now waiting in line to get through the serving line.  You look ahead of
you and you see a mass of people waiting for the same thing you are.  The line is
created through the use of a divider and the wall, where the space in between is
only big enough for one or two people.  As you approach the corner you see a stack of
trays for you to put your food on.
25433.name: Beginning of the Serving Line

description: A single guard is napping at his post here.  People are walking in and
out of the department.  Some people are carrying small envelopes, others
carry large boxes, and even one group came in with an iron cage
containing a large man eating version of a Venus fly trap, thankfully
there is a guard on hand to deal with any trouble, so long as he is done
with his nap.
25401.name: Guards Post

description: You are in a small jail cell that is just big enough for a cot, some floor space for
excersizing and a privy.  You notice that there is a small window along the north wall
that is barred to keep the law breaker inside.  The walls are made of solid concrete
and are padded to prevent injury to ones self.
25456.name: Jail Cell: 13 Charley

description: You are standing at an intersection that leads off in all directions.
The thick carpeting here is a dark color, which gives the room a more
pleasing look to it.  You see ushers directing people to their
designated areas, the members of the council to the north and the
spectators either to the east or west.
25460.name: Hall of Ushers

description: Finally, the food counter.  Here you can purchase food that is made by cooks that
are governmentally employed.  Behind the counter stands one of the cooks, a rather
large man who seems like he could lose a few pounds, and you can't help but think
to yourself, "That man must've eaten to much of his own cooking..."
25432.name: Government Foods

description: There is a long line in this hallway, mostly people in orange uniforms
with black numbers across the back.  Many are just standing here, but many
are also throwing a fit.  On man throws out a scream, "I didn't do it, It's
all a lie!  I was set up!"  .
25630.name: The Hallway to the Chambers.

description: You walk along the southern walls of the station.  The walls here
have all kinds of spray paint pictures on it, people's names, gang
signs, and just general crap.  A few chairs line the wall here, but
they look less than confrontable.  Some old posters hang on the wall.
{RTicket Booth:{r Far North{x
{RSeating Area:{r Not So Far North{x
{RPlatform:{r West{x
{RElevator: {rEast{x
25620.name: Along The Southern Wall

description: A set of empty desks sit here, one for each suboffice.  A clock on the
wall seems to be stuck at noon.  Everyone must still be at lunch.  The exit
is to the west, Budget Office is to the south, the Map Office is to the
north, and more of the Department is to the east.
25515.name: Receptionist Area

description: The tower is constructed from a dark grey marble,
carved from the lands of Deva, known for its valuable
minerals.  Each giant block was set in place with a
series of pullies and chains, lifted from the ground
below, weighing over several tons.  Cranes could now
make this job simple, but the tower was built while
the Tripower was young, along with technology.
25194.name: {GS{gouth-{GF{gace {&of the {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GT{gower{x

description: You continue down the squeaky clean hallway in the TriPower's bank
department.  The bright Fluorescent lights glare down at you as you walk,
making this place positively gleam.  Oak doors stand north and south of you,
each with small windows on the top that allow you to peer inside.  These
offices look alot more comfortable and spacious than the ones to your east.
Exits are north, south, east and west.
25110.name: A Well Polished Hallway

description: Uh Oh. It looks as though the Tri-Power
hirelings messed up big time. A large crate that might
have been filled with magical potions has tipped over.
The side that says "This side up" is upside down. The
crate is surrounded by shattered glass and bubbling
blue liquid. An executive is screaming expletives at
harried workers.
25425.name: Corner of the Import Warehouse

description: You are standing before a huge metal door.  A security guard stands
before the door, guarding it with his life, or at least to some extent.  The
door has a small metal device on the edge of it, which is used to swipe a
security card through it.  Only then would the door open and let you inside
the vault filled with money.
25114.name: The Door to the Vault

description: Welcome to {*The {YG{yr{&a{yn{Yd {RS{rtore {CE{Bast{x, the best place to find {CCommon{x
Clothing, including {Yshirts{x, {*pants{x and {&shoes{x.  The store opens up to
the east, revealing its {Rred{x and {*black{x interior.  You see the {Ylights{x
above shining down onto the diffrent displays in the store.
25006.name: {*The {YG{yr{&a{yn{Yd {RS{rtore {CE{Bast{c Entrance{x

description: You have entered the office of a high-powered TriPower executive.  The
room is spacious, in fact it is the size of a small house.  The skylights
look out on the city, and there is a small jacuzzi near the back wall.  A
tall mahogany desk is sitting leasurely in the middle of the room, with a
comfortable leather chair by it.  The only exit is north.
25112.name: A More Spacious Office

description: You stand on a northern platform.  Before you stands the train
platform.  You see the train tracks below you, running into the
underground tunnels of the station.  The platform seems to go in
either direction.  Pillars line the platforms just east of here, and
pass the pillars is the station.
25612.name: TriPower TrainStation Platform [D]

description: You stand before the newly printed history books.  Here, the books
of the years past history is kept, and logged.  You even see an
employee right now, working on today's logs.  Some other employees
stand around, looking through the cases and reading.
25212.name: <Library> Current History

description: You have entered the office of a TriPower office worker.  By the size of
the office you can tell that this guy isn't very high up in the chain of
command.  A plaque stating the name of the worker is the only thing hanging
on the drab brown painted walls, and a large mahogany desk is the only piece
of furniture.  On the desk is a large pile of paper work, which would look
very daunting if you had to do it.  The only exit is south.
25105.name: A Small Office

description: This is the Westernly most corridor, it has been built in the same white
wall marble floor fashion as the rest of the facility, there is a small
desk at the back of the wall.
25312.name: {&W{7estern {&C{7orridor{x

description: You have walked into the part of the tower where the TriPower money is
actually made.  Large machines make a huge whirring noise as you enter, and
the people using huge molds to shape the gold look directly up at you.  You
can barely see the walls, are this room is so large, and filled with molds
and machines to melt gold.  Printing presses can be seen south, printing all
the paper money, and more gold melting is happening to your north.
25119.name: The Mint

description: This eastern part of the cafateria seems to be in perfect order.  The pale green
light give the room a little atmosphere as the people here are quiet and eating
their food casually.  A loud {!*{1C{!R{1A{!S{1H{!*{x sounds at one of the tables.  You look
to see what happened and you notice... uh-oh the janitor's gonna be pissed now
someone dropped their tray... As everyone else in the room comes to the same
conclusion as you a round of applause sounds for the person who dropped their tray.
25430.name: Eastern Section of the Cafateria

description: You are standing in the entrance to a large warehouse that houses many of the
findings from the Science department.  There are boxes apon boxes of stuff, some
of which are labeled confidential and others are labeled as junk.  There are also
filing cabinets containing papers with research notes and formulas.  The room itself
is poorly lit to keep people from finding anything that may be of use to them.
25441.name: Warehouse of Sciences

description: This is the entrance to the Science and War Warehouses and the Federal Holding
Cells.  The hallway is well lit, with sheer white walls and tiled floor.  You see
guards milling about the place for shift changes and other important matters.
25435.name: Warehouse and Federal Cells

description: You walk along the {*The {yB{&ac{yk {RH{rall{Rs{* of the {YT{yo{&w{ye{Yr{x.  To the north you
see a door that reads "{RStairs{x".  To the south you see another door,
with a {Ybutton{x next to it.  The doors read "{YE{yl{*e{&va{*t{yo{Yr{x".  The hallway
continues east and west.
25085.name: {*The {yB{&ac{yk {RH{rall{Rs{* of the {YT{yo{&w{ye{Yr{x

25026.name: {GT{ghe {RE{rlevator{g of the {RT{rower{x

description: The tower is constructed from a dark grey marble,
carved from the lands of Deva, known for its valuable
minerals.  Each giant block was set in place with a
series of pullies and chains, lifted from the ground
below, weighing over several tons.  Cranes could now
make this job simple, but the tower was built while
the Tripower was young, along with technology.
25225.name: Above the {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GP{glaza{x

description: You have entered the office of one of the TriPower staff.  The name Ivan
was on the door, so its probable that Ivan is the little guy sitting behind
the incredibly small oak desk in the middle of the room.  From the size of
the office, the man is definitely not a big shot in the TriPower, just a
measly little office worker.  The only exit is south.
25108.name: A Small Office

description: This circular room is filled with from wall to wall hundreds of
packages and boxes and crates filled with files, equipment,
documentations and staff action packets.  At the center of the room is
a large central mailing system that shoots mail and information tubes
pneumatically to the hundreds of offices and distribution centers.  A
large dumwaiter is used to bring up large crates from beneath the
tower.  Nothing really interesting...
25083.name: The Mail and Distribution Center

description: You stand in a long and poorly lit hallway.  The walls are stone gray, as is the
floor, save for the bright yellow line that seems to have a glow of its own, that
runs down the center of the room.  You see exits leading in all directions, however
you notice that to the north and the south are jail cells.
25453.name: Eastern Cell Block

description: A small room with a desk and a large map of the realms on the wall.
Several Stick pins with flags are stuck all along the side of the map, but
none are actually flagging any locations, a whole can be seen in Westbridge
where a flage was removed and another just north of the crossroads.
25512.name: Office of Road Repair

description: The bookcases here are filled with more notebooks and blueprints.
A table stands infront of this bookcase with diffrent blueprints on
it.  You reconize one as an outline of an airship, and some others you
don't reconize.
25216.name: <Library> Machinery Facts

description: This room is where the guards to the jail cells sit and wait for jail breaks,
releases, pardons and other such things.  The room is unremarkable and bare,
except for a large oak desk along the east wall, where the head guard takes care of
all the in-processing and out-processing paperwork.
25445.name: Guard Post

description: The Electricity sound stops for a moment and you hear people talking.
Then suddenly the electricity hums again and the lights flicker.  A cruel
tone of laughter comes from within the east wall.
25649.name: The Hallway.

description: These halls shine brightly from the sun entering from the windows
at the end of the northerly hallway.  The alabaster halls are coursed
with thin veins of silver and make for a dazzling array of contrasting
shine.  Potraits of several Grand Judges line the walls in a tribute
to their magnificent service to the common folk and to the values of
law and order.  Down the hall to the west sits a sign reading (Quiet!
Meeting in Progress).  At the end of the north hall is a
glass-enclosed promenade.
25076.name: The Western Hall

description: The tower is constructed from a dark grey marble,
carved from the lands of Deva, known for its valuable
minerals.  Each giant block was set in place with a
series of pullies and chains, lifted from the ground
below, weighing over several tons.  Cranes could now
make this job simple, but the tower was built while
the Tripower was young, along with technology.
25223.name: Above the {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GP{glaza{x

description: A small hallway leads west to a large metal door.  A ladder on the
eastern side of the room leads downwards into the Tripower Tower.
25183.name: Hatchway to the Tower Roof

description: You are standing at the start of the western section of the benches
used for the audience.  As you look on ahead you see that the benches
are set up to form a horseshoe around the table located in the center.
The benches here are lavishly decorated and well padded for a long
session.
25467.name: Western Section of the Audience

description: You are walking through a well polished hallway in the banking section of
the TriPower tower.  The walls are painted a bright green, which at times
hurts your eyes.  There are doors north and south which lead to offices of
some of the banking officials.  The doors are covered with sticky notes and
plaques for good work.  AS you look in through the small glass windows above
each office door you can see peons of the tripower working futilely at
stacks of paper.  Exits lead south north, west and east.
25104.name: A Well Polished Hallway

description: A large podium stands infront of the hall.  To the south, the whole
meeting arena stands before you, tables and tables of different
groups, waiting to hear you speak.  Two large tables extend to either
side of you, use to hold the other people who are holding this
meeting.  Behind you a giant banner of the TriPower stands.  Welcome
to the podium.
25071.name: The TriPower Podium

description: {x
{x
{x
{x  Most kingdoms are ruled by a council of people made up of the King or
Queens loyalest subjects, but this not how the Tripower Kingdom is ran.
The Tripowerian Congress is made up of members known as Senators, who
help the Kingdom rule over itself.  New laws and matters are voted on,
and worldly matters are spoken of.  As the largest government in the
Great Realms, the Tripower Kingdom plays a major role to all other bodies
of government.  Within these chambers that government is controlled.
25046.name: {CE{cntrance of the {RT{rri{Bp{bowerian {RC{ron{Bg{bress{x

{x
{x
{x  You stand in the blackhole of the TriPower.  The place, where all power
comes from.  You stand in a large office, expanding most of the length of
the tower.  Large windows surround the whole room, you see a balcony
outside, the circles the whole tower.  Between each window, a gas light
burns, with its green flame.  The office is dressed in the TriPower Fasion.
Towards the back, a large desk stands, with papers and other important
documents placed on it.  The ceiling extends very high, almost like a
cathedral.  Outside the windows, gives view to the city of Torregiano.
Miles of buildings and roads extend either way, all around the office.  To
one side, you see "Stalin's Organ" sticking out from the tower, and across
the city.  In the distance, in each corner of the great wall, you see a
large building, with a green glow flowing from it.  To the north, you see
the Sea Of Istar, and the Port of Torregiano.  To the north, you see the
Highland Mountains.  On the floor, the TriPower Bars spread across the whole
office, and flags hang down around the room, with the TriPower Bars on them.
A door to the west leads out to the balcony, and outside the door, you see a
large platform extending away from the tower.  An airship, tied to the
tower, floats just above the platform.  Welcome To The President's Office.
25998.name: President Bloodstoner's Office

description: You are in a small jail cell that is just big enough for a cot, some floor space for
excersizing and a privy.  You notice that the only window in this room is the one
located on the door, but that is barred so to keep the criminals in.  The walls are
made of solid concrete and are padded to prevent injury to ones self.
25447.name: Jail Cell: 13 India

description: You have walked into a luxurious office of a TriPower executive.  You can
see the whole city through the huge window on the wall to the south.  A
large mahogany desk stands in the middle of the room, with a few papers
stacked neatly upon it.  The walls are metallic in nature and have a few
paintings of landscapes hanging upon them.  The only exit is north.
25117.name: A More Spacious Office

description: You are in a small jail cell that is just big enough for a cot, some floor space for
excersizing and a privy.  You notice that the only window in this room is the one
located on the door, but that is barred so to keep the criminals in.  The walls are
made of solid concrete and are padded to prevent injury to ones self.
25446.name: Jail Cell: 13 Golf

description: You have entered an incredibly spacious and luxurious TriPower office.
The skylights look out over the city, and there is a large bath tub in the
center of the room.  A huge mahogany desk is in the corner of the room,
neatly stacked with newly printed money and such.  The executive is on the
phone with the distributors of the money, who are waiting for a new batch.
The only exit is south.
25118.name: A More Spacious Office

will be coming out the {Rp{rubli{Rc{x.  Diffrent posters hang off the walls,
revealing the future.  The floor has a few {rdisplays{x showing off
diffrent items, behind {&glass{x.  The rest of the store is to the {Csouth{x
and {Mwest{x.
25045.name: {*The {YG{yr{&a{yn{Yd {RS{rtore {CE{Bast{c [Preview]{x

description: You stand in the National Library of the TriPower State.  The room
here is bright, and filled with books.  Large oak bookcases line the
walls inside the library.  There is almost no room on any of the
shelves, for extra books.  The room is bright, and in greyish colors.
The ceiling is a dark gray, drop ceiling tiles with makou gas lights
built into them.  The floor is a deep blue rug.  The walls showing is
a blueish gray color.  You see a large model in the center of the
library, and two desks on either side of it.
25200.name: The Lobby Of The Cannon Dept

Relations.  The office is made up with the same light gray the outter
offices have.  On the walls you see pictures of diffrent TriPower areas.  A
flag hangs off one wall, with the four bars of the TriPower.  On the north,
east and south wall a large window overlooks Torregiano.  You can see out
into the TriPower Plaza.  In the middle of the room, a large desk stands,
filled with papers.  A small chair stands infront of it.
25304.name: Sidney Deadwillow's Office

description: {YAccessories{x is a priority when you want to look good.  Here
diffrent racks hold diffrent accessories.  You see a rack of {Mbelts{x,
{Ggauntlets{x, everything right down to earrings.  The store extends in
the other directions, but to the east, you see a very large {*bin{x.
25040.name: {*The {YG{yr{&a{yn{Yd {RS{rtore {CW{Best{c [Accessories]{x

25031.name: {GT{ghe {RE{rlevator{g of the {RT{rower{x

description: This is the Basement of the Tripower tower.  It looks as if no one
has been here for a long time.  Many spider webs gather in every
corner available.  It smells of old water and mildew, not a fun place
to be.
25601.name: {RT{rri{Bp{bower {CC{complex {RT{rower {cBasement{x

description: You have entered a small office.  The boring brown painted walls are
filled with pictures of family and friends of the office worker who resides
here.  A mahogany desk sits at the end of the room, piled with paperwork and
even more photos of children, mothers, friends, and relatives.  It seems
this guy has alot of friends.  North is the only exit.
25106.name: A Small Office

description: The Tripowerian Congress is home of the people's government of the
Tripower Kingdom.  The congress is made up of members called senators,
who help the government rule themselves.  The Congressional Room on
the 9th floor of the Tripower Tower is a large circular room built on
tiers.  The Podium that stands in the center of the room is sunk in,
while the Senator's Desks that circle the podium slowly rise tier per
tier as it extends away from the center.  The outter walls are carved
into pillars which meet up in a central dome.  South of the central
podium is a walkway leading to the tower elevators.
25275.name: {R[{C Jihad {R]{x {CS{cenator {CS{ceats{x

description: You step into a large spacious office. It has a
great view of the city, but it's partially obscured by
two huge file cabinets. In the middle of the room is a
huge desk, piled high with papers. You see an id tag
left on the desk that says [Sergeant of the Order].
25417.name: Inside the cluttered office

description: You enter the back halls of the tower, a restricted area that is
only open to those who are {YT{yo{&w{ye{Yr {yEm{Yploy{yee's {RO{rnl{Ry{x.  The hall is
somewhat small, and goes to the north.
25804.name: {YT{yo{&w{ye{Yr {yEm{Yploy{yee's {RO{rnl{Ry{x

description: A large staircase curves upwards into the 20th floor of the tower.
On the 20th Floor is the Presidential Office, and the ruler known as
Lord Bloodstoner.  The top of the stairs disappears into the 20th
floor.
25086.name: Presidential Hall: West Staircase

description: The Hum of electricity grow louder as does the scream.  The hallway grows
farther to the north as it seems it will never end.  On the west wall you
notice many portrats of important people in Capital punishment.
25650.name: The Hallway.

description: This Seems to be a waiting room of some sort.  Many people sit in chairs
here, crying, sobing, or just sitting there solemly know what is about to
happen.  As the lights flicker and dim, a large hum of electricity is heard
and a scream is emitted.
25629.name: The Wating room.

description: A small room with two desks, a list of names adorn the wall beside the
door, all but the last one have a line crossed through it, a little mousy
man sits here trembling behind the desk, mumbling something about the dark.
25504.name: Office of Underdark Alternative

description: The Tripowerian Congress is home of the people's government of the
Tripower Kingdom.  The congress is made up of members called senators,
who help the government rule themselves.  The Congressional Room on
the 9th floor of the Tripower Tower is a large circular room built on
tiers.  The Podium that stands in the center of the room is sunk in,
while the Senator's Desks that circle the podium slowly rise tier per
tier as it extends away from the center.  The outter walls are carved
into pillars which meet up in a central dome.  South of the central
podium is a walkway leading to the tower elevators.
25245.name: {R[{C Unguilded and Non-Factioned {R] {CS{cenator {CS{ceats{x

description: This portion of the warehouse is neatly kept and actually looks like it is oft
used.  There is a desk in the middle of the room with large maps and battle
plans.  Along the walls you see shelfs and filing cabinets filled with books, maps
and verious documents on strategic operations.  You also notice that this area is
well lit for a warehouse, which is for the people who come in here to look for
necessary documents.
25440.name: Southwest Corner of the Warehouse

25252.name: The End Of The Butt Of The Cannon

description: This room is set up to look something like a bar.  Behind the counter is the
bartender, who has an almost ragged appearance, almost like that of a pirate.  As
you scan the many barrels of liquid, you notice that one has a black mark on it
resembling a skull and cross bones, could this stuff be that legendary Grog?
25431.name: Beverage Court

description: The Tripowerian Congress is home of the people's government of the
Tripower Kingdom.  The congress is made up of members called senators,
who help the government rule themselves.  The Congressional Room on
the 9th floor of the Tripower Tower is a large circular room built on
tiers.  The Podium that stands in the center of the room is sunk in,
while the Senator's Desks that circle the podium slowly rise tier per
tier as it extends away from the center.  The outter walls are carved
into pillars which meet up in a central dome.  South of the central
podium is a walkway leading to the tower elevators.
25233.name: {R[ {RC{rhurch {RO{rf {bN{*ightmares {R] {CS{cenator {CS{ceats{x

description: You are standing at the entrance to the Department of Agriculture.  Great pictures
of plantlife are hung on the walls to give the place a more pleasing look.  The
walls are a pale white that reflects light to give a brighter appearance.  The floor
is covered with plush carpet that has floral patterns on it.  You see a hallway to
the north that leads to the offices and other parts of the agricultural department.
25400.name: Entrance to Dept. of Agriculture

description: You step out of the elevator onto the shiny floor of the TriPower
building.  A large sign on the wall, which is painted a bright sort of
green, catchs your eye.  It declares this floor the place where all the
TriPowers money is handled and sometimes spent.  A security guard checks to
see if your a citizen and are authorized , then waves you through.  South,
west , and east are your exits.
25100.name: Department of Banks and Mints

description: The Tripowerian Congress is home of the people's government of the
Tripower Kingdom.  The congress is made up of members called senators,
who help the government rule themselves.  The Congressional Room on
the 9th floor of the Tripower Tower is a large circular room built on
tiers.  The Podium that stands in the center of the room is sunk in,
while the Senator's Desks that circle the podium slowly rise tier per
tier as it extends away from the center.  The outter walls are carved
into pillars which meet up in a central dome.  South of the central
podium is a walkway leading to the tower elevators.
25274.name: {R[ {CH{ca{*r{7pe{&r All{7ia{*n{cc{Ce{x {R] {CS{cenator {CS{ceats{x

description: This one-way hallway with white walls and a high ceiling, goes from
east to west.  The standard Tri-Power Tower marble floor glistens,
as if it was just waxed.
25310.name: {&W{7estern {&H{7allway{x

description: You are walking down a shiny well polished hallway.  The lights sparkle
against the shiny floor and hurt your eyes at times.  Two oak doors are
north and south of you.  Each of them has a name on them, so they must
belong to some of the office workers around here.  Some of the staff walk
around you on errands, and one even crashes full force into you.  North,
west, south, and east are the exits.
25107.name: A Well Polished Hallway

description: This is an old broom closet that has been closed for years.  The walls
and floor are covered with dust.  There is one solitary mop and bucket
sitting in one corner of the closet, and a single lightbulb is above.  There
is an evil smell comming from the bucket, as if the last thing cleaned up
was a milk spill in the lunch room.
25625.name: The Broom Closet.

description: The Tripowerian Congress is home of the people's government of the
Tripower Kingdom.  The congress is made up of members called senators,
who help the government rule themselves.  The Congressional Room on
the 9th floor of the Tripower Tower is a large circular room built on
tiers.  The Podium that stands in the center of the room is sunk in,
while the Senator's Desks that circle the podium slowly rise tier per
tier as it extends away from the center.  The outter walls are carved
into pillars which meet up in a central dome.  South of the central
podium is a walkway leading to the tower elevators.
25242.name: {R[{C Loners {R] {CS{cenator {CS{ceats{x

description: A large walkway stretches northwards to the center of the
Tripowerian Congressional Room.  The floor slowly lowers itself in
tiers until it reaches the large round stone podium in the center of
the room.  The outter walls are carved into pillars and form a dome
ceiling above.  Encompassing the podium in the center on each tier are
small deskes which are for the Senators to sit at, each of them with a
small makou gas lamp built into the corner.  These are the chambers in
which worldly decisions are made in by the Tripower Kingdom.
25236.name: {7The {CC{central {RC{ron{Bg{bressional {CW{calkway{x

description: The warmth of the sun gently fills this room with a peaceful
setting.  Hanging plants in gilded pots dangle from the ceiling and
create stark contrasting shadows that sway with the breeze.  There are
several cafe-tables that are spread out along the promenade for people
to sit and rest their worries.  The white marble floors echo the sound
of footfalls throughout the windowed enclosure.
25080.name: The Enclosed Promenade

description: This long, rectangular room, is filled with shelves, and bookcases.
All the books, and scrolls contain the legend lore of items, and every
spell ever created.  Within these tomes you could find out the components
of any spell, or the special abilities of every item.
25316.name: {BC{bhamber {BO{bf {BL{bore{x

description: You are walking down a light gray hallways.  The walls have diffrent
pictures.  A few plants lay on the tables.  To the north you see a door
reading "Dept.  Of Complaints" and to the south you see "Dept.  Of
Requests".  Back west is the main office, to the east, the hallway
continues.
25302.name: Hallway

description: You stand within the cavern that makes up the TriPower National
Train Station.  This place isn't as pretty as the tower, it is badly
lighted, dirty and dangerous.  Crime down here is actually horrid,
even though the Headquaters of the TriPower is directly above.  The
station stands before you, its own cavern.
{RElevator: {rSouth{x
{RStation: {rWest & North{x

description: The tower is constructed from a dark grey marble,
carved from the lands of Deva, known for its valuable
minerals.  Each giant block was set in place with a
series of pullies and chains, lifted from the ground
below, weighing over several tons.  Cranes could now
make this job simple, but the tower was built while
the Tripower was young, along with technology.

description: This room is funished in dark walnut furnishings, several cusioned chairs
sit here for waiting adventurers to rest on, a rack of magazines for those
who are waiting, a Dryad sits behind the Desk chewing on her fingernails.
She looks up, snaps her gum, and asks "How can I Help you?"
25509.name: Dept. Head Secretary's Office

description: The tower is constructed from a dark grey marble,
carved from the lands of Deva, known for its valuable
minerals.  Each giant block was set in place with a
series of pullies and chains, lifted from the ground
below, weighing over several tons.  Cranes could now
make this job simple, but the tower was built while
the Tripower was young, along with technology.
25190.name: {GS{gouth-{GF{gace {&of the {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GT{gower{x

description: You step out onto the northern balcony ontop of the TriPower Tower.
Before you stands the northern part of the city.  A long round stone
wall circles the roof of the building, making one large balcony all
away the round the office.  The northern end stands before you, the
two makou reactors, the harbor, the Battle Arena.  What a splendid
city.
25995.name: The North Balcony Of The Tower

description: You are amazed by the piles of junk people in
this country are willing to buy. The shelves are
crammed with everything from dwarven metal work to
fine silks from Thalos. It must be impossible for
whoever works here to keep track of all this mess.
25424.name: The Import Warehouse

description: This is the Basement of the Tripower tower.  It looks as if no one
has been here for a long time.  Many spider webs gather in every
corner available.  It smells of old water and mildew, not a fun place
to be.
25603.name: {RT{rri{Bp{bower {RT{rower {CW{cater {CS{cupply {CM{caintenance {CR{coom{x

description: The lights of machinery glare down at you as you walk into this part of
the hall.  There is a metal detector in the middle of it, with a security
guard standing next to it.  You are ushered into the metal detector by the
guard, and forced to remove your weapons.  The walls here are no longer
green, but are more metallic.  You can see a large door to your west.  There
is also an exit to your east.
25113.name: Security Check

description: You have entered a very small office.  An equally small oak desk sits in
one of the corners in the room.  There is an uncomfortable wooden chair
behind it, and a stack of papers piled on top of it.  The walls are boring
and painted brown.  The only thing hanging from them is a picture of a dog.
The only exit is north.
25109.name: A Small Office

description: This is the Basement of the Tripower tower.  It looks as if no one
has been here for a long time.  Many spider webs gather in every
corner available.  It smells of old water and mildew, not a fun place
to be.
25617.name: {RT{rri{Bp{bower {CC{complex {RT{rower {cBasement{x

description: The door to this room used to be locked.  All sorts of experimental
herbs and plates where stored here.  However, most of the employees have
cleaned it out by now.  All that remains is a brick of some funny
smelling weed that no one  wants for some reason.
25412.name: The Forbidden Closet

description: The Tripowerian Congress is home of the people's government of the
Tripower Kingdom.  The congress is made up of members called senators,
who help the government rule themselves.  The Congressional Room on
the 9th floor of the Tripower Tower is a large circular room built on
tiers.  The Podium that stands in the center of the room is sunk in,
while the Senator's Desks that circle the podium slowly rise tier per
tier as it extends away from the center.  The outter walls are carved
into pillars which meet up in a central dome.  South of the central
podium is a walkway leading to the tower elevators.
25249.name: {R[ {RCr{rim{Rso{rn {BGu{bar{*di{ban{Bs{x {R] {CS{cenator {CS{ceats{x

description: You walk along the station.  The place is huge, pillars hand down
holding the superstructure above, the TriPower Complex Tower.  The
station is very dark, and dirty.  Trash rolls around the station, and
bums walk around picking through that trash.  To the north you see a
large door that reads "CLOSET".  To the south you see the elevator,
and to the west is the train platform.
25618.name: {RT{rri{Bp{bower {CG{crand {CC{central {*- {RM{rain {RE{rntrance{x

description: Here you see large notebooks, and blueprints stuffed in the
bookcase.  The Section sign above reads "Makou Reactors".  A small
desk sits infront of this bookcase, and you see some blueprints layed
out.
25215.name: <Library> Makou Reactors

description: The tower is constructed from a dark grey marble,
carved from the lands of Deva, known for its valuable
minerals.  Each giant block was set in place with a
series of pullies and chains, lifted from the ground
below, weighing over several tons.  Cranes could now
make this job simple, but the tower was built while
the Tripower was young, along with technology.
25192.name: {GS{gouth-{GF{gace {&of the {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GT{gower{x

description: You stand at the eastern end of the hallway.  The room looks pretty much the same,
except there is a wall blocking you from going east.  The yellow line that you saw
earlier ends just a few feet away from the wall, indicating any prisoners to stop.
To the north and south you see a couple more of the Federal jail cells.
25454.name: Eastern Cell Block

description: The {YBargin Bin{x, the best place to find those {rlow low{x priced items,
more or less items no one wants.  This section of the store holds
nothing but a large {&glass bin{x.  Within the bin, you see everything,
{Rswords{x, {Gdaggers{x, {Yarmor{x.  Hmm, you would of thought they wouldn't mix
weapons with clothing.  To the north, a door leads north, which reads
"{REm{rploy{Ree's {YOnly!  {x".
25039.name: {*The {YG{yr{&a{yn{Yd {RS{rtore {CW{Best{c [Bargin Bin]{x

description: This is the entrance to the warehouse that is used to store weapons and other war
related items.  This portion is pretty bare as new weapons that get developed are
cataloged immediately and put away.  You see a small desk with papers pertaining
to checking items in an out of the warehouse.
25437.name: Warehouse of War & Weapons

description: A Hall here leads into the Department of Roads and Bridges, the walls are
covered in renderings of the Cities of the Tri-Power, Westbridge is on the
north wall, and New Thalos is on the south wall.  A door here is the
entrance to the Office of Magical Transportation.
25506.name: Short Hall

25600.room_name: A bum walks along here, picking through some trash.
25600.name: The Bum~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

25601.room_name: A passanger waits here for the train.
25601.name: A passanger~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
A lovly girl sits at her desk before you.  She is Nicki, the President
Secretary.  She is tall, with semi-long blonde hair, that cuts off just
below her neck.  Her eyes are a dark blue, and she smiles at you.
25990.room_name: Nicki, The President Secretary sits here.
25990.name: Nicki~

F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
The man stands very tall, and very blank looking.  He wears a black
suit, and dark sunglasses.  His face shows no expression, and he just
looks around the area, and at his other agents.
25991.room_name: A Secret Service agent is standing here, keeping guard.
25991.name: TriPower Secret Service~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

25610.name: The Railway Ticket Seller~

description:
Hes a small kenku.  His feather ruffle and bunch up against the TriPower
security guard uniform hes wearing, and his wings threaten to cut out the
back.
25100.room_name: A kenku security guard checks you over before letting you in.
25100.name: a kenku security guard~
subroutines: M greet 25100 100~

description:
A huge titan stands before you.  His head reachs way up into the ceiling,
and his face looks as hard as rock.  Powerful muscles are easily seen on his
arms and legs.  He growls at you as you try to enter the vault.
25101.room_name: A huge TriPower Security Guard blocks your way to the vault.
25101.name: a huge TriPower Security Guard~
subroutines:
M exall 25102 3~
M greet 25101 100~

25038.room_name: The Tripower Tower Complex Healer stands here, lending a hand.
25038.name: The Healer~

description:
Before you stands the priest of Death.  He is covered in black robes, his
face hidden behind his cloak.  He passes his healing hands over those, who
are bowing to him, and worshiping him.  Some even are giving sacrifices to
him.  
{Mcurse''curse' to see a listing of spells.
25040.room_name: The Evil Priest Stands Here, in his black cloak.
25040.name: the evil priest~

description:
Before you stands the priest of good.  He sits on his throne healing
those who are in the light of the good.  He is dressed all in white robes,
and is passing his hand over those who are in need.  
{MType 'repent' to see a listing of spells.{x
25041.room_name: The Priest Of Good stands here, healing her fellow people.
25041.name: The Priest Of Good~

description:
A mint worker pours the gold into the tiny individual molds.  The worker
than leaves to gather already cooled money and put it into sacks.
25102.room_name: A mint worker helps to make TriPower money.
25102.name: a mint worker~

25700.d_flags: D The Guard spits up blood as he tries to utter one last curse.~
description:
This man stands over six feet tall.  He is a well kept human, wearing
a Tri-Power Security Guard uniform.  He appears to be muscular, but
one never can tell.
25700.name: {7Security Guard{x~

M exall 25700 0~
M exall 25700 2~
M exall 25700 3~

description:
This charismatic young human, is beaming a great big smile back as
you look at her.  She is wearing a white and red uniform with the
{!D{1o{!M {xcrest on it.
25312.room_name: Sitting at the desk is a small human, secretary.
25312.name: A small woman~

M greet 25312 40~

description:
This elderly gnomish man, is short like the rest of his kin, and smells
a bit like radishes.  His hair is grey with age, and he has deep brown

description:
A Tower Guard stands here, watching you as you walk into the room.
He is dressed in the Legion Standard uniform, and he is about
middle age. He looks at your shirt, and then your hand for a pass.
MOBPROG NOTICE: To get pass this guard, please hold your
TriPower pass in your hand, and say pass.
25002.room_name: A TriPower Tower Complex Security Guard stands at his post.
25002.name: Security Guard~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
She is a lovly small blonde hair girl. She looks at you
with her brown eyes. You notice she does not look like
she should work here, she is dressed in baggy cloths.
25003.room_name: Beth the Reception Hall Secretary sits here.
25003.name: Beth the Receptionist~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
The elevator just barely holds the titan, he sits in one corner,
holding a rope.  He is dressed in a red suit, and has a small hat on. 
=== MOBPROG ===
This mob uses mprogs to move you about the elevator.
There are 19 floors you can go to. All floors above
the 10th Floor is off limits to civilians, with an
exception of floor 19. All you have to do to change
floors is to say, the floor number. Like to go to
floor 19, just say '19'. If you ask for a floor that
you are restricted from, the titan will let you know.
25004.room_name: The Elevator Titan stands here, waiting for which floor.
25004.name: Elevator Titan~

description:
Before you stands the current guard on shift.  He is of average height and a heavy
build.  You can tell by his grim features that he is proud of his uniform and
his job.  As you walk in he looks at you with inquiring eyes, wondering why you
have entered his domain.
25400.room_name: A Federal Prison Guard stands here, watching for an escape attempt.
25400.name: a federal prison guard~
subroutines: F for HM

description:
A fat man is here cooking some of the most disgusting and plain food that you've
seen in your lifetime.  He is wearing a shirt that looks to be two sizes too small,
and a pair of work trousers to keep any grease or any other food product off of
himself.
25401.room_name: A fat pudgy man stands here cooking food for Tri-Power employees.
25401.name: a Tri-Power Cook~
subroutines: F for AHMV

description:
Before you stands a tall, skinny man.  He bears many scars from his days as a pirate.
He looks up and smiles at you with an almost evil grin.
25402.room_name: A tall man stands here serving drinks to customers.
25402.name: The Pirate Bartender~
subroutines: F for AHM
